Module rupizza.ru_pizza
Package rupizza.ru_pizza

Class StoreOrders

java.lang.Object
rupizza.ru_pizza.StoreOrders
public class StoreOrders
extends java.lang.Object
StoreOrders class representing all the store orders.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    StoreOrders()
    Constructs a StoreOrders object to keep track of store orders.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addOrder​(Order order)
    Adds an order to the store orders.
    double calculateTotalRevenue()
    Calculates and retrieves the total revenue, including sales tax, for all orders.

    Calculates and retrieves the total sales tax for all orders.

    Cancels an order by removing it from the store orders.

    Exports the store orders to a text file.

    Retrieves the details of a specific order.

    Retrieves the total number of orders in the store.

  • Method Details

    • addOrder

      public void addOrder​(Order order)
      Adds an order to the store orders.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to be added.

    • cancelOrder

      public boolean cancelOrder​(int orderNumber)
      Cancels an order by removing it from the store orders.
      Parameters:
      orderNumber - The order number of the order to be canceled.
      Returns:
      True if the order was found and canceled; false otherwise.

    • export

      public void export​(java.lang.String filename)
      Exports the store orders to a text file.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the text file to export to.

    • getTotalOrders

      public int getTotalOrders()
      Retrieves the total number of orders in the store.
      Returns:
      The total number of orders.

    • getOrderDetails

      public java.lang.String getOrderDetails​(int orderNumber)
      Retrieves the details of a specific order.
      Parameters:
      orderNumber - The order number of the desired order.
      Returns:
      The details of the specified order.

    • calculateTotalSalesTax

      public double calculateTotalSalesTax()
      Calculates and retrieves the total sales tax for all orders.
      Returns:
      The total sales tax amount.

    • calculateTotalRevenue

      public double calculateTotalRevenue()
      Calculates and retrieves the total revenue, including sales tax, for all orders.
      Returns:
      The total revenue amount.
